casebody.data:
SMITH
v.
PARMAEI. No. 141P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. Michael E. Ciochina, Asheville, for Christiane N. Smith.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of March 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2005."
